PPRUserWithProducts

@objc
open class PPRUserWithProducts : NSObject

This class provides interfaces for registering a product and getting list of all registered products for a valid signed in user.

Since

1.0.0
  • registerProduct(_:)

    Register any product. A valid user must be logged in before calling this API.

    Since

    1.0.0

    Declaration

    Swift

    @objc
open func registerProduct(_ product: PPRProduct)

    Parameters

    product

    Object of PPRProduct. This class contains details of the product to be registered.
  • getRegisteredProducts(_:)

    Get the list of all the registered products for a valid user.

    Since

    1.0.0

    Declaration

    Swift

    @objc
open func getRegisteredProducts(_ success: @escaping PPRSuccess)

    Parameters

    success

    It’s a completion block.
